main-text:
SHORT BRIEFING            Pg. 2
-------------------------------

Your mission is to infiltrate the island fortress and retrieve the missing satellite blueprints.
                  :mainfortress:
The main fortress      is well guarded and you will have to
destroy the security radars :radar:
on each level in order to access it. 


-------------------------------
Press PgUp-PgDn        Esc-Exit
